parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It discusses public health issues related to mosquito-borne diseases and preventative measures.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and addresses the general public regarding public health concerns.  The reach estimate is ">1M", indicating a wide audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to raise public awareness about mosquito-borne diseases and the importance of preventative measures. There is no attempt to influence voters in favor of or against any particular candidate or party.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents information in a journalistic style, citing a biologist's opinion on the issue. It aims to inform the public about a matter of public health, not to advocate for a specific political position.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post includes the opinion of a biologist, it's presented as factual information related to public health, not as a personal opinion unrelated to the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1648066156116529</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post does not constitute electoral propaganda.  It focuses on a public health issue (mosquito-borne diseases) and preventative measures.  While the post is a paid advertisement, its content is purely informational and does not mention or endorse any political candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections. The post does not meet the criteria outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, as it lacks a direct reference to a candidate or party, an explicitly electoral objective, and does not exceed the limits of journalistic information.  The post's timing after the election period is irrelevant because it is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Videomedicina.ro</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
